snippet: Corporation-sponsored programs that match retirees with volunteer opportunities are helping retirees put their skills to good use at schools and other nonprofit institutions.
abstract: Corporation-sponsored programs that match retirees with volunteer opportunities are helping retirees put their skills to good use at schools and other nonprofit institutions; resources are also emerging for retirees to find opportunities even if their former employers do not have programs in place.
lead_paragraph: Corporation-sponsored programs that match retirees with volunteer opportunities are helping retirees put their skills to good use at schools and other nonprofit institutions.

headline.seo: Retirees Stay Active as Volunteers, With Help From Their Companies
headline.main: Employers Oversee an Army of Retiree Volunteers
headline.print_headline: Employers Oversee an Army of Retiree Volunteers
